Good extensions I've used in the past:
- multi-command
- Atom One Dark Theme
- TODO Highlight
- CodeLLDB (debugging Rust)
- Remote - SSH

Optional:
- EditorConfig for VS Code
- ESLint
- JSON Tools
- Prettier
- rust
- Rust Syntax
- rust-analyzer
- Pylance
- Python
- Python Debugger
- Extension Pack for Java
	- Language Support for Java(TM) by Red Hat
	- Test Runner for Java
	- Debugger for Java
	- Project Manager for Java
	- Maven for Java
